group_1.textLeft: Is Ao coming?

group_1.textRight: Doesn't seem like it...

group_1.textLeft: I see. Not today either, hm...
I presume she's still out to get Ranka, then.

group_1.textRight: You knew about that?

group_1.textLeft: I had seen both of them in Monzenbashi. @They were pawns for the Bat, correct?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
I just don't want Ao to go overboard...

group_1.textLeft: That girl has to do what she has to do.
Since it's a personal grudge, @I'm not going to intervene.
I think for now, we should let her do what she @wants, so that she can sort her feelings out.

group_1.textRight: If you're sure...
But if you need me to, I'll go find her.

group_1.textLeft: Could you do that, then?
I need to talk to her before I talk to the Ryuugasaki @girls.

group_1.textRight: Ao knows a lot about them.

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, which is why I need to see her.
Hmm...

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: You should head to Janomiya's base.
None of them are here today, so that's @most likely where they are.

group_1.textRight: You don't think they're gonna betray us, do you?!

group_1.textLeft: Hmhm, I'm not worried about that..

group_1.textRight: Are we really not going to do anything as Janomiya anymore?

group_1.textLeft: Did you call me out here to ask me that~?

group_1.textRight: We've been talking about you because you never @show up at Torayamachi's base.
We're starting to think maybe you're not satisfied @with this.

group_1.textLeft: I am, I am~ @I'm totally satisfied with what happened~
We lost and got a Game Over~
And I don't think anyone wants to rise up against @Torayamachi again and get themselves killed.
The power balance has finally collapsed, @you know?
If Torayamachi and Ryuugasaki are gonna talk @things out, I think we should wait and see what @happens~

group_1.textRight: But it feels like, how do I say this... @Like you're just forcing yourself to be happy...
It doesn't seem like you really feel that way.

group_1.textLeft: You're imagining things.
Even if it doesn't seem like it, I believe in @Torayamachi and Hikaru for now~

group_1.textRight: Then why won't you come to their base?

group_1.textLeft: Because I have to kill Ranka Chizu first.

group_1.textRight: [chara:770087:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]â€”?!

group_1.textLeft: That's the one thing I have to settle before I can join Torayamachi.
I can't count the number of times she took @advantage of me... How many times I almost died @because of her.
So I want you guys to let me at least do that much~
For my sake, as well as all of yours~

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sure we'll be fine with Torayamachi. @They've inherited our goals now.
I think there's gonna be a talk between the two @gangs, so let's not interfere, okay~?

group_1.textRight: We understand.
What great timing!

group_1.textLeft: Hikaru?

group_1.textRight: I feel a little left out that you didn't invite me for this Janomiya meeting...

group_1.textLeft: Very funny. You've been with Torayamachi all along~

group_1.textRight: Ahaha...

group_1.textLeft: So what do you mean by "great timing"?

group_1.textRight: It's about the negotiations with Ryuugasaki.
Yuna needs your help to get 'em to join us.

group_1.textLeft: Me?
